title: Check Status of Amended Return
description: A taxpayer filed an amended return (Form 1040-X) several months ago and wants to know its status.

tasks.description: Gather the taxpayer's personal information and the tax year of the amended return.
Access the IRS 'Where's My Amended Return?' online tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully accesses the IRS portal.

tasks.description: Enter the taxpayer's information to retrieve the status and inform the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the status is 'Processing' and informs the client.
